definition[0]: if two or more things harmonize, they work well together or look good together
example[0]: The new offices harmonize with the other buildings in the area.
definition[1]: to make two or more sets of rules, taxes etc the same
example[1]: the proposal to harmonize tax levels throughout the EU
definition[2]: to sing or play music in harmony
definition[3]: to make two or more systems, sets of rules etc more similar so that they work better together
example[2]: a European Commission directive to harmonise rules on copyright in different EU countries
